full_description:
\n
Sustainable Engineering Services values work life balance and employee safety. We provide a flexible working environment and believe that our team is our greatest asset. Currently our team is working on a hybrid schedule, with multiple layers of COVID-19 safety precautions in place at the office.
\n
The first assignment for this position requires full-time in office presence supporting one of our clients in their digital transformation efforts.
\n
\n
Responsibilities:
\n
\n
Structure large data sets to find usable information
\n
Collect, review and maintain data to monitor pre-established KPIs
\n
Create reports for internal teams and/or external clients
\n
Collaborate with team members to collect and analyze data
\n
Use graphs, infographics and other methods to visualize data
\n
Work with a team of analysts and other associates to process information
\n
Create presentations and reports based on recommendations and findings
\n
\n
Requirements:
\n
\n
Bachelors Degree in Information Management, Computer Science, Mathematics, Economics or Finance
\n
Knowledge of data gathering, cleaning and transforming techniques
\n
Ability to develop front end and back end solutions
\n
Reporting and data visualization skills using Power BI
\n
Ability to reverse-engineer and modify existing spreadsheets and dashboards
\n
Understanding of data warehousing and ETL techniques
\n
\n
\n
Coding skills in languages such as SQL, Python and/or R
\n
Analytical and problem-solving skills
\n
High proficiency in Microsoft Excel
\n
High proficiency in Microsoft Sharepoint
\n
Ability to set and meet deadlines
\n
Technical writing skills
\n
Excellent attention to detail
\n
Strong written/verbal communication skills
\n
Ability to QA and troubleshoot data
\n
\n
